params.offer: The proof offer that is being bid upon.
params.signature: The signature of the proof offer.

returns._0: rewardToken The address of the reward token         rewardAmount The token reward amount available upon resolution.         resolutionDeadline The timestamp defining when the proof offer must be resolved.

computeOfferId((address,address,uint256,.details: hashes the proof offer for use as the offer ID in mapping `activeProofOfferData`

computePermitDigest(((address,uint256),u.details: computes the digest the signer signed in order to perform the ec recover operation.

params.offerId: The offerId associated with the proof offer being resolved.
params.opaqueSubmission: The opaque data that will be decoded by the market contract and passed                         to the verifier. Empty if the deadline has been reached and the provider                         is being slashed.

bid((address,address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Place a bid for a signed proof offer.

computeWitnessHash((address,address,uint.notice: hash a ProofRequest, used as witness to the signature

resolve(bytes32,bytes).notice: Resolve a bid for a signed proof offer.
